name: High Roller (Pepperfaced)
description:
For the GMTK Game Jam

Move - arrow keys

Primary attack - X

Special attack - Z

Enter portal/Open chest - down arrow

Using special attacks gives a random chance to use abilities in one of your three ability slots. Open chests to get special abilities. Brown chests hold tier 1 abilities, white chests hold tier 2, and blue chests hold tier 3.

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam
